original_text: When I told you God's good news, I never asked you to pay me anything. I made myself less important so that you could be more important. I do not think that I was wrong to do that.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 높이려고 나를 낮추어 하나님의 복음을 값없이 너희에게 전함으로 죄를 지었느냐

sentences.original_text: When I told you God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 하나님의 좋은 소식을 전해줄 때

sentences.original_text: I never asked you to pay me anything
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 아무것도 달라고 한 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: so that you could be more important
I do not think that I was wrong to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그렇게 하는 것이 잘못되었다고 생각하지 않는다
